text: fja' min baed hwla' aladhin wsfnahm badal su' 'ukhidhuu alkitab min aslafhm, fqr'wh welmwh, wkhalfu hkmh, yakhudhun ma yuearid lahum min matae aldunya min dny' almakasib kalrshwt wghyrha; wdhlk lshdt hrshm wnahamhm, wayaqulun mae dhlk: 'iina allah sayughfar lana dhunubana tmnyana ealaa allah alabatyl, wa'iin yat hwla' alyhwd mtae zayl min 'anwae alharam yakhudhuh wysthlwh, msrrin ealaa dhunubihim wtnawlhm alhram, alam yukhadh ealaa hwla' alehwd bi'iiqamat altawrat waleamal bima fyha, wa'alla yaquluu ealaa allah 'iilaa alhaqa wa'alla ykdhbu elyh, welmu ma fi alkitab fdyewh, wtrku aleamal bh, wkhalfu eahd allah 'iilayhim fi dhlk? waldaar alakhirat khayr liladhin yataqun allh, fymtthlwn awamrh, wyjtnbwn nwahyh, 'afala yaeqil hwla' aladhin yakhudhun dny' almakasib 'ana ma eind allah khayr wa'abqaa llmtqyn?
